short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically translates HoloBuilder.com links into embedded 3D presentations on Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can dive into virtual 360Â° tours that were created with HoloBuilder.com directly on Facebook. Simply post the link to a HoloBuilder presentation and HoloPlayer for Facebook will automatically create an embedded virtual tour from it. Visit https://www.holobuilder.com/ for more information!
